thread.title: Scott Geering
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Scott Geering

author: Scott Geering
title: Scott Geering
text: My Salesman, Mike Lamb was very patient with me, I asked tons of questions and he was able to answer each one, I was very pleased from the minute he introduced himself to the closing, I am very Happy with my selection of Mattress that I chose and I will be a great returning customer, your store, and more so Mike Lamb really impressed me, I just want Gardner White to know how much he stepped up to this customer and closed the deal! Bravo Zulu!
